entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
